reviewText:
I'm only just going to talk about one episode in this DVD, if you want to know about the other two go buy it. The episode that I'm going to explain is "HURIN."

A man called Papa and a girl having oral sex in a car. On their way to their hotel room, they have sex in the elevator. Once inside the room, they continue to have sex, relentlessly, using whatever it takes to derive as much pleasure as possible. Their not related even though the girl calls the man Papa, the bond they have with each other is sex.
